plant.question: I am green and grow in the ground. Animals like rabbits like to eat me. What am I?
I have a trunk and leaves and give you shade. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 Birds like to build nests in me.
🍂 My leaves change color in the fall.

plant.question: I'm a colorful plant that bees love and smell very sweet. What am I?
I'm long, green, and crunchy. You can eat me as a snack or in a salad. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 You can find me in a garden.

plant.question: I grow on a vine and can be red, green, or purple. People make juice from me. What am I?

hints.text: ☀️ I need lots of sun to grow.

plant.question: I am a seed that pops when heated. People love to eat me at the movies. What am I?
I'm a plant with a hard shell and sweet inside. Monkeys love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌴 I grow on tall trees in warm places.
🐒 Monkeys are good at opening me.

plant.question: I am a very tall plant with golden seeds. People use me to make flour. What am I?

hints.text: 🌾 You can find me in fields.

plant.question: I am a green plant with prickly needles instead of leaves, and people decorate me during Christmas. What am I?

hints.text: 🎁 I am often decorated with lights and ornaments.

plant.question: I am a spicy bulb that makes your eyes water when you cut me. People use me to flavor their food. What am I?

hints.text: 😭 Cutting me can make you cry.

transport.question: I have wheels and go 'vroom vroom!' What am I?

hints.text: 🚗 I can be red, blue, or any color!
👨‍👩‍👧‍👦 You can ride in me with your family.
🚦 I need a road to move.

transport.question: I float on the water, and sometimes have a sail. What am I?

hints.text: 🦢 I am bigger than a duck but not as big as the Titanic!

transport.question: I fly in the sky and take people to far away places. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I am bigger than a bird!
✈️ You need a ticket to ride me.

transport.question: I travel on tracks and carry lots of people. What am I?

hints.text: 💺 I am longer than a car.

transport.question: I have two wheels and you pedal me with your feet. What am I?

hints.text: 👧 You need to balance to ride me.
🔔 I might have a bell to ring.

transport.question: I help put out fires and have a loud siren. What am I?
I can take you to the moon and beyond!

hints.text: 👩‍🚀 I need a lot of fuel!
✨ I travel very far, very fast!

transport.question: I am like a car, but I can carry many people at once around a town or city. What am I?

hints.text: 🏫 Sometimes I take children to school
🚏 I stop to pick people up

transport.question: I can fly but I don't have wings, and I spin around to fly. What am I?

hints.text: 🚁 I can hover in the air.
🚦 I am smaller than an airplane.
🔄 I have a spinning blade on top.

transport.question: I'm a vehicle that can travel on both land and water. What am I?

hints.text: 🦆 I am more complex than a boat.
🛣️ I can drive on roads and float on water.
🛠️ I have special features to do both.
